description: Merges rows of two datatables into a new datatable.

input.name: columns
input.description:
Specifies which columns to be included.
If unassigned, all columns in both datatables will be included.

input.name: intersect columns
input.description:
Specifies whether to only include columns which exist in both datatables.
If unassigned, it defaults to `False`.

output.name: data
output.description: A new datatable containing joined rows and columns.
